alert.note: Alert for Greene (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 29 at 4:34PM CDT until August 29 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTH CENTRAL GREENE COUNTY... At 434 PM CDT, Emergency management reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 2 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Springfield, Republic, Battlefield and Brookline. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
